con:interface.name: GoSoap.CoverageCheck201801
con:interface.con:description: ISP soap functions to retrieve coverage information

At least 4 digits to be provided with pattern [1-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]","required":true,"style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"pattern":"^[1-9][0-9]{3} ?[a-zA-Z]{0,2}$","type":"string"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Success","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/CheckVoipNetCodeResponse"}},"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/CheckVoipNetCodeResponse"}},"text/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/CheckVoipNetCodeResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad
